remarks: The union of a chain (with respect to inclusion) of one-to-one functions is a one-to-one function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2015.)
statement:
fun11iun.1 $e |- ( x = y -> B = C ) $.
fun11iun.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
fun11iun $p |- ( A. x e. A ( B : D -1-1-> S /\ A. y e. A ( B C_ C \/ C C_ B ) ) -> U_ x e. A B : U_ x e. A D -1-1-> S ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x $.
$d S x $.
